Class Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylibpixel.components.Component

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Window

    public class Frame
extends Panel
    Class that is used to create a Frame on the screen.
    Since:
    Feb 27, 2013 at 5:18:39 PM, v0.1
    Version:
    Feb 27, 2013 at 5:18:39 PM, v0.1
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak
